data.name: Gangs of Space - Shark Investor Pack
data.detailed_description:
Please note that the Gangs of Space servers will be permanently closed after May 31, 2019. You will not be able to enjoy your DLC after this date.

The Shark Investor Pack contains the following:

• unlock the remaining 15 item slots in your first Warehouse
• an additional 5 extra Warehouses of 25 item slots each
• 7 extra ship slots in your Hangar
• the Tiger skin for Gemeter ships (Early Access exclusive)
• the Panther skin for Astrolax ships (Early Access exclusive)
• the White Shark skin for Gemeter ships (Early Access exclusive)
• 400,000 Credits
• 50 Shares that will keep paying out Credits (Early Access exclusive)
• the right to name a crew in the game (Early Access exclusive)
• the right to name a sector in the game (Early Access exclusive)
• the right to name a system in the game (Early Access exclusive)
• the Shark Investor title

Early Access exclusive:


Items marked as Early Access exclusive are only available if you purchase these packs while the game is in Early Access. They are immediately available, and you will get to keep them after the game release too. There will be no way to get these items after the game leaves Early Access.

Credits:


Credits are used to purchase advanced versions of the playable ships once you have unlocked them in the game.

Credits can be earned in the game by conquering sectors; thus the Credits you obtain in the packs are just a quality-of-life improvement, and are in no way necessary to enjoy the full content of the game.

Shares:


Shares represent a way for you, the player, to "invest" in the success of Gangs of Space. At the end of the conquest of every Galaxy, we will compute all Credits spent by all players during the conquest, and give back 10% of this sum as "dividends" to players with Shares. Thus, the more players play Gangs of Space, the more Credits you will earn regularly.

Obtaining Shares is only possible during Early Access, but they will continue to produce Credits after the release of the game. It is an original way for us to reward the players that believe in us before anyone else!

IMPORTANT: Shares work like real-world shares for publicly-traded companies, but they are only a gameplay element. We are *not* giving back real-world money, and these Shares do *not* give you any legal right on the company that produces the game.

Multiple packs:


If you purchase multiple packs, please note that the "remaining 15 item slots in your first Warehouse" will be unlocked only once. All the other rewards will be added up to your account properly.

data.short_description: The Shark Investor Pack contains a large assortment of storage and Credits that makes life easier as a starting Gangs of Space player, plus a lot of cosmetic bonuses.

  • Processor: Dual core 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Pixel Shader 3.0 compatible
